# Third-party Components

- `third_party/pico-sdk` (submodule)

- `third_party/FreeRTOS-Kernel` (submodule)
  - License: see upstream FreeRTOS license
- `third_party/waveshare_demo` (submodule)

No vendored third-party source is used outside submodules.
